EchoLang

Real-time Speech-to-Text (STT) and translation system for code-switched Hindi-Tamil-English audio. Optimized for low-resource settings, it enables contextual transcription and intent-aware translation for use cases like voice-based search and medical transcription.

PyTorchWhisperNLLB-200Sentence-BERT
import torch
from transformers import pipeline

# Load a pre-trained ASR model
transcriber = pipeline(
    "automatic-speech-recognition", 
    model="openai/whisper-medium"
)

# Transcribe an audio file
result = transcriber("audio_sample.wav")
print(result["text"])
MusiConvert

A Python-based cross-platform tool for secure playlist sharing and conversion between Spotify and YouTube Music, with a focus on Wi-Fi Direct transfer, encryption, and reliable data transfer.

PythonSpotipyytmusicapiWi-Fi DirectCryptography
import spotipy
from spotipy.oauth2 import SpotifyClientCredentials

# Authenticate and fetch playlist tracks
auth_manager = SpotifyClientCredentials()
sp = spotipy.Spotify(auth_manager=auth_manager)

playlist_id = '37i9dQZEVXbNG2KDcFcKOF'
results = sp.playlist_tracks(playlist_id)
